items.sentence: I can't turn it up any louder. That's as loud as it goes.
The fire department is located right next to the airport.
Tom didn't realize Mary was going to have to leave early.
Tom had enough time to do everything that had to be done.
Tom said he was able to do everything he'd planned to do.
I was afraid Tom might not do what he was supposed to do.
These toilets better be spotless by the time I come back!
Why do I get the feeling that I'm not going to like this?
I hope you won't tell anyone you saw me leave this house.
It would be much better to do this the way Tom suggested.
I've already done that more times than I'd like to admit.
The only time I eat popcorn is when I'm watching a movie.
The Suez canal connects the Red Sea to the Mediterranean.
I wouldn't want you to get the wrong impression about me.
After such a disappointment, Mary needs to be cheered up.
I stayed in bed one more day just to be on the safe side.
I was afraid I wouldn't have the pleasure of meeting you.
Mary is a warm, caring person, but Tom is cold and aloof.
Doing that was more difficult than I thought it would be.
I should've tried to get along with my classmates better.
